class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.EscortPrisonersToJail
class.description: The knowledge of the 'EscortPrisonersToJail' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getReachable
method.description: Returns the main objective of the mission (the camp to jail prisoners).

method.name: getElements
method.description: Returns the prisoners units to take into account, depending on the number of first line units available.

method.name: getNbrFront
method.description: Returns the number of first line unit that take prisonners into account. This implementation returns the number of the prisoner units.
